project.name: Platform bill of materials
project.description: Platform bill of materials (based on https://docs.spring.io/platform/docs/Cairo-SR7/reference/htmlsingle/) Migrating to Spring Framework 5.1.x (https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework/wiki/Migrating-to-Spring-Framework-5.1) As spring.io/platform is EOL, it follows closely latest iteration of Spring Boot 2.1.x

requireMavenVersion.message: You are running an older version of Maven. ${project.artifactId} requires at least Maven 3.5.x

requireJavaVersion.message: You are running an older version of Java. ${project.artifactId} requires at least JDK ${java.version}
